cnbc.title: Supreme Court to hear case on Trump birthright citizenship order
cnbc.summary: The U.S. Constitution's 14th Amendment had been understood to grant citizenship to children born in the country, even if their parents are not citizens.

cnbc.title: Judge finalizes remedies in Google antitrust case
cnbc.summary: A U.S. judge on Friday finalized his decision for the consequences Google will face for its search monopoly ruling, adding new details to the decided remedies.

cnbc.title: Berkshire Hathaway is on track to lag behind the S&P 500 in Buffett's last year as CEO
cnbc.summary: With less than a month to go, Berkshire Hathaway's B shares are behind the S&P in their 2025 race. With dividends included, the S&P's lead is even bigger.

cnbc.title: Trump administration waives $11 million fine for Southwest Airlines' 2022 holiday meltdown
cnbc.summary: The Trump administration said it will forgive the last $11 million of a fine against Southwest Airlines that stems from the carrier's 2022 holiday meltdown.

cnbc.title: From the California gold rush to Sydney Sweeney: How denim became the most enduring garment in American fashion
